# localizedDescription

**Instance Property**

A description of the DNS proxy.

## Declaration

```swift
var localizedDescription: String? { get set }
```

## Accessing DNS proxy configuration properties

- **isEnabled**: The status of a DNS proxy.
- **providerProtocol**: The provider-specific portion of the DNS proxy configuration.
